helpText: Need help? Contact us at agriJJtech@hotmail.com
helpDescription: The Playground is your central workspace where you can access all AgriTech tools. Here you can manage files, create AI chats, and access advanced features to optimize your agriculture.
helpFooter: The Playground is constantly evolving. Stay tuned for new features!

chat.title: AI Chat
chat.details: Create intelligent conversations about your crops, get personalized recommendations, analyze agricultural problems and receive expert advice in real time.

files.title: File Management
files.description: Upload and analyze documents related to your agriculture
files.details: Upload PDFs, images and documents. Our AI analyzes them to extract relevant information about crops, reports, technical manuals and more.

analytics.title: Data Analytics
analytics.description: Visualize and analyze your crop performance
analytics.details: Interactive charts, detailed reports, performance comparisons and predictive analysis to optimize your agricultural decisions.

automation.title: Automation
automation.details: Schedule automatic irrigation, pest alerts, fertilization reminders and scheduled tasks based on environmental conditions.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work as a team with other farmers
collaboration.details: Share data, reports and experiences with other users. Create work groups and collaborate on agricultural projects.

integration.title: IoT Integration
integration.details: Integrate temperature, humidity, pH sensors and other IoT devices for automatic monitoring and control of your operation.
